title: If I eat 30 gram carbs per day and low calories, will I lose muscle or fat? - Quora

response.answer_text: Any time you’re in a caloric deficit, it will result in loss of both fat and muscle. Depending on what you eat, your body composition, and when you eat, it can be between 10% and 25% muscle loss. Intermittently fasting and getting exercise and eating enough protein will limit muscle loss.
